data.eml:eml: A new species and new records of Oocyclus Sharp, 1882 (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jordão, Rafael, Clarkson, Bruno, Ferreira-Jr, Nelson (2018): A new species and new records of Oocyclus Sharp, 1882 (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4382 (1): 195-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4382.1.10
